post.description: Use this API to add a beneficiary to your Cashfree account by providing the bank account number, IFSC, and other required details. Before you request a transfer, ensure the account has been successfully added as a beneficiary.

beneId.description: Unique Beneficiary ID to identify the beneficiary. Alphanumeric and underscore (_) allowed (50 character limit)

name.description: It is the name of the beneficiary. A maximum of 100 characters are allowed. Alphabets, numbers, white spaces ( ), and special characters are allowed.

email.description: Beneficiaries email, string in email Id format (Ex: johndoe_1@cashfree.com) - should contain @ and dot (.) - (200 character limit)

phone.description: Beneficiaries phone number, phone number registered in India (only digits, 8 - 12 characters after stripping +91)

bankAccount.description: Beneficiary bank account (9 - 18 alphanumeric character limit)

ifsc.description: Accounts IFSC (standard IFSC format) - length 11, first four bank IFSC and 5th digit 0

vpa.description: Beneficiary VPA, alphanumeric, dot (.), hyphen (-), at sign (@), and underscore (_) allowed (100 character limit). Note: underscore (_) and dot (.) gets accepted before and after at sign (@), but hyphen (-) get only accepted before at sign (@)

address1.description: Beneficiaries address, alphanumeric and space allowed (but script, HTML tags gets sanitized or removed) (150 character limit)

address2.description: Beneficiary address, alphanumeric and space allowed (but script, HTML tags gets sanitized or removed) (150 character limit)

city.description: Beneficiary city, only alphabets and white space (50 character limit)

state.description: Beneficiary state, only alphabets and white space (50 character limit)

pincode.description: Beneficiaries pincode, only numbers (6 character limit)

message.example: Beneficiary added successfully
APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)
Beneficiary Id already exists
Post data is empty or not a valid JSON
Please provide a valid Bank IFSC code.

code-samples.code:
curl -X POST \
  'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1/addBeneficiary' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}' \
  -d '{
  "beneId": "JOHN18011343",
  "name": "john doe",
  "email": "johndoe@cashfree.com",
  "phone": "9876543210",
  "bankAccount": "00111122233",
  "ifsc": "HDFC0000001",
  "address1": "ABC Street",
  "city": "Bangalore",
  "state": "Karnataka",
  "pincode": "560001"
}'

code-samples.name: Node

code-samples.code:
from cashfree_sdk.payouts import Payouts
from cashfree_sdk.payouts.beneficiary import Beneficiary

bene_add = Benefeciary.add(beneId="JOHN18012", name="john doe", email="johndoe@cashfree.com", phone="9876543210", address1="ABC Street", bankAccount="00001111222233", ifsc="HDFC0000001")

get.description: Use this API to get the ledger balance and available balance of your account. Available balance is ledger balance minus the sum of all pending transfers (transfers triggered and processing or pending now).

message.example: Ledger balance for the account
APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)

code-samples.code:
curl -X GET \
  https://{{Host%20Url}}payout/v1/getBalance \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}\

const cfSdk = require('cashfree-sdk');
const response = await cfSdk.Payouts.GetBalance();
code-samples.name: Node

code-samples.code:
from cashfree_sdk.payouts.transfers import Transfers
b = Transfers.get_balance()

post.description: Use this API to request an internal transfer at Cashfree. The internal transfer API is useful for multiple Payouts accounts. The API response will either result in an ERROR or SUCCESS response.

rechargeAccount.description: Cashfree internal recharge account number. Alphanumeric allowed

transferId.description: A unique ID to identify this transfer. Alphanumeric, hyphen and underscore (_) allowed (40 character limit). If the value is not passed, the id will be autogenerated.

message.example: APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)

code-samples.code:
curl -X POST \
  'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1/internalTransfer' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}\
  -d '{
	"amount": 1.1,
	"rechargeAccount": "492372992"
}'

code-samples.name: Node

code-samples.code:
from cashfree_sdk.payouts.transfers import Transfers
transfer = Transfers.internal_transfer(amount=1.1, rechargeAccuont="492372992")

post.description: Use this API to request a self withdrawal at Cashfree. Self withdrawal is allowed a maximum of 3 times a day. The API response will either result in an ERROR or SUCCESS response. The status of the withdrawal request is available on the dashboard.

withdrawalId.description: Unique identifier for the withdrawal, alphanumeric allowed (50 character limit)

remarks.description: Remarks, if any. Alphanumeric and white space (70 character limit)

message.example: Request submitted successfully. Withdrawal Id : W55
APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)

code-samples.code:
curl -X POST \
  'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1/selfWithdrawal' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}\
  -d '{
	"withdrawlId": "1",
	"amount": 2
}'

code-samples.name: Node

code-samples.code:
from cashfree_sdk.payouts.transfers import Transfers
withd = Transfers.self_withdrawal(withdrawalId="withdraw1", amount=1.1, remarks="withdrawal request")

post.description: Use this API to initiate an amount transfer request at Cashfree by providing beneficiary id, amount, and transfer id. This is an async transfer request.

amount.description: Amount to be transferred. Decimal allowed (>= 1.00)

transferId.description: A unique id to identify this transfer. Alphanumeric and underscore (_) allowed (40 character limit).

transferMode.description: It is the mode of transfer. Allowed values are: banktransfer, neft, imps, rtgs, upi, paytm, and amazonpay. The default transferMode is banktransfer.

remarks.description: Additional remarks, if any. alphanumeric and white spaces allowed (70 characters limit)

message.example: Transfer Initiated
APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)
Remarks is invalid

code-samples.code:
curl -X POST \
  'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1/requestAsyncTransfer' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}' \
  -d '{
  "beneId": "JOHN18011343",
  "amount": "1.00",
  "transferId": "JUNOB2018"
}'

get.description: Use this API to fetch the transaction history for a particular beneficiary and for a desired period of time.

parameters.name: beneId
parameters.description: The beneficiary id that you have created. Alphanumeric characters accepted.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date for the desired period. Format - yyyy-mm-dd

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date for the desired period. Format -  yyyy-mm-dd. If start date is provided,  end date is a mandatory. End date has to be a day less than current date.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of transactions to be displayed on the page. Maximum = 25. Default value set is 25.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Will show the latest transfers on the first page. Minimum = 1. Default value set is 1.

message.example: Data retrieved successfully
APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)
Please provide a valid beneId

code-samples.code:
curl --location --request GET 'https://payout-api.cashfree.com//payout/v1/beneHistory?beneId=VENKY_UPI&startDate=2021-05-27&endDate=2021-05-31&perPage=10&page=1' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer  <token>'

get.description: Use these details to get details of a particular transfer. You can pass referenceId or transferId to fetch the details.

parameters.name: referenceId
parameters.description: Reference ID of the transaction. (Either referenceId or transferId is mandatory)

referenceId is invalid or does not exist

--header 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json'

remarks.description: Additional remarks, if any. Alphanumeric and white spaces allowed (70 characters limit).

post.description: Use this API to create a Cashgram.

cashgramId.description: Unique Id of the Cashgram. Alphanumeric, underscore (_), and hyphen (-) allowed (35 character limit)

linkExpiry.description: Date to expire the cashgram link, Date format YYYY/MM/DD, maximum 30 days from the date of creation.

notifyCustomer.description: If value is 1, a link is sent to customers phone and email.

message.example: Cashgram Created
Cashgram with id JOHaN10 already exists

code-samples.code:
curl -X POST \
  'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1/createCashgram' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}'
  -d '{
            "cashgramId": "JOHaN10",
            "amount": "1.00",
            "name": "John Doe",
            "email": "johndoe@cashfree.com",
            "phone": "9876543210",
            "linkExpiry": "2020/04/01",
            "remarks": "sample cashgram",
            "notifyCustomer": 1
}'

code-samples.name: Node

code-samples.code:
from cashfree_sdk.payouts import Payouts
from cashfree_sdk.payouts.cashgram import Cashgram
c = Cashgram.create_cashgram(cashgramId="JOHaN10", amount="1.1", name="john doe", email="johndoe@cashfree.com", phone="9876543210", 
linkExpiry="2020/04/01", remarks="sample cashgram", notifyCustomer=1)

post.description: Use this API to create multiple transfers to multiple beneficiaries. This API accepts an array of transfer objects under the batch field.

batchTransferId.description: Unique Id of the Batch Transfer, alphanumeric and underscore allowed (60 character limit)

batchFormat.description: Format of the batch transfers, valid values are, BENEFICIARY_ID, BANK_ACCOUNT, UPI, PAYTM, AMAZONPAY. Details are available below.

deleteBene.description: Flag to delete and read new beneficiaries if a beneficiary with the same Beneficiary Id is available. When the batch transfer format is BANK_ACCOUNT

message.example: APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)
Batch TransferId abc-12356 already exists
Permission Denied

code-samples.code:
curl --location --request POST 'https://payout-api.cashfree.com//payout/v1/requestBatchTransfer' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "batchTransferId": "abc-.12356",
    "batchFormat": "BANK_ACCOUNT",
    "batch": [
        {
            "amount": "1",
            "transferId": "1234",
            "remarks": "Transfer with Id 12356",
            "name": "john doe",
            "email": "johndoe@cashfree.com",
            "phone": 9876543210,
            "bankAccount": "00111122233",
            "ifsc": "HDFC0000001"
        }
    ]
}'

cashgramId.description: ID of the Cashgram to be deactivated. Alphanumeric and underscore (_) allowed (35 character limit)

message.example: Cashgram with id - JOHaN10 successfully deactivated!
Cashgram with id JOHaN10 does not exists

code-samples.code:
curl -X GET \
  'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1/deactivateCashgram?cashgramId=JOHaN10' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}'

code-samples.name: Node

code-samples.code:
from cashfree_sdk.payouts import Payouts
from cashfree_sdk.payouts.cashgram import Cashgram
status = Cashgram.deactivate_cashgram(cashgramId="JOHaN10")

post.description: Use this API to authenticate with the Cashfree system and obtain the authorization bearer token. All other API calls must have this token as Authorization header in the format 'Bearer <token>' (without quotes) for them to get processed.

parameters.name: X-Cf-Signature
parameters.description: Signature to be sent if IP is not whitelisted

message.example: Token is valid
Invalid clientId and clientSecret combination

code-samples.code:
curl -X POST \
  'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1/authorize' \
  -H 'X-Client-Id: {{client id}}' \
  -H 'X-Client-Secret: {{client secret}}' \

  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}'

post.description: Use this API to verify the bearer token generated. If the token does not exist/invalid/expired, the response "Token is not valid" is returned. Regenerate token in case of token expiry to make API calls (use /payout/v1/authorize for this).

message.example: Token is valid
Token is not valid

code-samples.code:
curl -X POST \
  'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1/verifyToken' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}' \

post.description: Verify the bearer token generated. If the token does not exist, is invalid, or has expired, the response "Token is not valid" is returned. Regenerate token in case of token expiry for making API calls ( use /payout/v1/authorize for this).

message.example: Token is valid
Token is not valid

code-samples.code:
curl -X POST \
  'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1/verifyToken' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}' \

post.description: Use this API to initiate amount transfers directly to the beneficiary account via a bank transfer or UPI. You can add the beneficiary details in the same API request.

amount.description: Amount to be transferred. Amount should be greater that INR 1.00. Decimals are allowed.

transferId.description: A unique ID to identify this transfer. Alphanumeric characters and underscores are allowed (40 character limit).

transferMode.description: It is the mode of transfer. Allowed values are: banktransfer, neft, imps, rtgs, upi, paytm, and amazonpay. The default transferMode is banktransfer.

beneDetails.description: Object with the beneficiary details to whom amount is to be transferred

bankAccount.description: Beneficiary bank account (9 - 18 alphanumeric character limit) (Required in case of banktransfer, imps, neft mode)

ifsc.description: Accounts IFSC (standard IFSC format) - length 11, first four bank IFSC and 5th digit 0 (Required in case of banktransfer, imps, neft mode)

name.description: Beneficiary name, only alphabets and white space (100 character limit)

phone.description: Beneficiary phone number, phone number registered in India (only digits, 8 - 12 characters after stripping +91)

email.description: Beneficiary email address, string in email Id format (Ex: johndoe_1@cashfree.com) - should contain @ and dot (.) - (200 character limit)

vpa.description: Beneficiary VPA, alphanumeric, dot (.), hyphen (-), at sign (@), and underscore () allowed (100 character limit). Note: underscore () and dot (.) gets accepted before and after at sign (@), but hyphen (-) get only accepted before at sign (@) (Required in case of UPI)

address1.description: Beneficiary address. Alphanumeric characters and space allowed (150 character limit).

message.example: APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)

code-samples.code:
{
 "amount": "3.00",
 "transferId": "JUNOB2018142",
 "transferMode": "banktransfer",
 "remarks": "test",
 "beneDetails" : {
     "bankAccount": "026291800001191",
     "ifsc": "YESB0000262",
     "name": "Ranjiths",
     "email": "ranjiths@cashfree.com",
     "phone": "9999999999",
     "address1": "any_dummy_value"
 }
}

post.description: Use this API to initiate an amount transfer request at Cashfree by providing beneficiary id, amount, and transfer id. This is a sync transfer request.

amount.description: amount to be transferred. Decimals allowed (>= 1.00)

transferId.description: A unique Id to identify this transfer. Alphanumeric and underscore (_) allowed (40 character limit).

transferMode.description: It is the mode of transfer. Allowed values are: banktransfer, neft, imps, rtgs, upi, paytm, and amazonpay. The default transferMode is banktransfer.

paymentInstrumentId.description: Specify the fund source ID from where you want the amount to be debited.

remarks.description: Additional remarks, if any. Alphanumeric and white spaces allowed (70 characters limit).

message.example: APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)

  'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1.2/requestTransfer' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}' \
  -d '{
  "beneId": "JOHN18011",
  "amount": "1.00",
  "transferId": "JUNOB2018"
}'

from cashfree_sdk.payouts import Payouts
from cashfree_sdk.payouts.transfers import Transfers

tnx_req = Transfers.request_transfer(beneId="JOHN18011", amount="100.1", transferId="DEC2017", transferMode="banktransfer", remarks="Test transfer")

            "name": "Transfer2"
        }
    ],

}'

get.description: Use this API to get the list of incidents on banks(Resolved,Unresolved,All) for a given time range.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Incident status - RESOLVED/UNRESOLVED/ALL are the allowed values Default value is UNRESOLVED if not provided

parameters.name: startTime string
parameters.description: Start Time for the desired period. Format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

parameters.name: endTime string
parameters.description: End Time for the desired period. Format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss. Default values are current day start Time(00:00:00) and end Time(23:59:59) if not provided.

parameters.name: entityCode string
parameters.description: Code for the entity(BANK) on which the incidents are created.

Result.value:
{
    "status": "SUCCESS",
    "subCode": "200",
    "message": "List of incidents retrieved",
    "data": {
        "incidents": [
            {
                "id": 214711,
                "type": "BENEFICIARY",
                "entity": "BANK",
                "mode": "IMPS",
                "createdAt": "2022-01-05 00:48:54",
                "resolvedAt": "2022-01-05 00:53:24",
                "isScheduled": false,
                "isResolved": true,
                "impact": "LOW",
                "entityName": "City union bank",
                "entityCode": "CIUB"
            },
            {
                "id": 214710,
                "type": "BENEFICIARY",
                "entity": "BANK",
                "mode": "IMPS",
                "createdAt": "2022-01-05 00:43:24",
                "resolvedAt": "2022-01-05 00:45:24",
                "isScheduled": false,
                "isResolved": true,
                "impact": "LOW",
                "entityName": "City union bank",
                "entityCode": "CIUB"
            }
        ]
    }
}

APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)
startTime should be less than or equal to EndTime

-H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token>}}'\

post.description: Use this API to initiate amount transfers directly to the beneficiary account via a bank transfer or UPI. You can add the beneficiary details in the same API request.

amount.description: Amount to be transferred. Amount should be greater that INR 1.00. Decimals are allowed.

transferId.description: A unique ID to identify this transfer. Alphanumeric characters and underscores are allowed (40 character limit).

transferMode.description: It is the mode of transfer. Allowed values are: banktransfer, neft, imps, rtgs, upi, paytm, and amazonpay. The default transferMode is banktransfer.

beneDetails.description: Object with the beneficiary details to whom amount is to be transferred

bankAccount.description: Beneficiary bank account (9 - 18 alphanumeric character limit) (Required in case of banktransfer, imps, neft mode)

ifsc.description: Accounts IFSC (standard IFSC format) - length 11, first four bank IFSC and 5th digit 0 (Required in case of banktransfer, imps, neft mode)

name.description: Beneficiary name, only alphabets and white space (100 character limit)

phone.description: Beneficiary phone number, phone number registered in India (only digits, 8 - 12 characters after stripping +91)

email.description: Beneficiary email address, string in email Id format (Ex: johndoe_1@cashfree.com) - should contain @ and dot (.) - (200 character limit)

vpa.description: Beneficiary VPA, alphanumeric, dot (.), hyphen (-), at sign (@), and underscore () allowed (100 character limit). Note: underscore () and dot (.) gets accepted before and after at sign (@), but hyphen (-) get only accepted before at sign (@) (Required in case of UPI)

address1.description: Beneficiary address. Alphanumeric characters and space allowed (150 character limit).

paymentInstrumentId.description: Specify the fund source ID from where you want the amount to be debited.

message.example: APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)

code-samples.code:
curl --location --request POST 'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1.2/directTransfer' \
-H 'Authorization: Bearer {{Token}}'
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
 "amount": "20.00",
 "transferId": "JUNOB201814n009",
 "transferMode": "neft",
 "remarks": "test",
 "beneDetails" : {
     "bankAccount": "026291800001191",
     "ifsc": "YESB0000262",
     "name": "Ranjiths",
     "email": "ranjiths@cashfree.com",
     "phone": "9999999999",
     "address1": "any_dummy_value"
 },
 "paymentInstrumentId": "YESB_CONNECTED"
 }'

post.description:
Use this API to transfer money to beneficiary cards. Provide details such as beneficiary name, card type, network type, and transfer ID.

You need to pass the tokenised card number or card token for this transfer.

token.description: It is the tokenised card number or card token for this transfer.

amount.description: Amount you want to transfer. Amount should be >= 1.00. Decimals are allowed.

transferId.description: Unique transfer ID to identify the transfer. Alphanumeric characters and underscore are allowed. The maximum character limit is 40.

remarks.description: Remarks for your reference. Alphanumeric characters and whitespace are allowed. The maximum character limit is 70.

name.description: The name of the beneficiary who receives the transfer amount.

cryptogram.description: It contains formatted chip/cryptogram data relating to the token cryptogram. The maximum character limit is 600. It is optional for MASTERCARD and not required for VISA.

tokenExpiry.description: Applicable only for MASTERCARD. The format for the valid token expiry date should be YYYY-MM. It cannot be null. Provide a valid tokenExpiry if collected from the customers. If unavailable, populate a static value with a forward year and month in the correct format (YYYY-MM). The maximum character limit is 10.

cardType.description: Specify if it is a debit or credit card. Values allowed: DEBIT/CREDIT. CREDIT is the default value if the parameter does not exist or is not specified.

tokenPANSequenceNumber.description: A maximum of 3 alphanumeric characters are allowed. It is optional for MASTERCARD and not required for VISA.

message.example: Transfer completed successfully
Transfer request pending at the bank
Transfer Id already exists
Not enough available balance in the account

code-samples.code:
curl --location --request POST 'https://payout-api.cashfree.com/payout/v1/cardpay' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer JRoaAaJdFUVMvEByHAj' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "token": "4640837720072836", 
    "amount": 1.2,
    "transferId": "cardpay_11",
    "remarks": "Transfer to card",
    "name": "John Doe",
    "networkType": "VISA",
    "tokenExpiry" : "2026-07",
    "cardType" : "CREDIT"
}'

post.description: Use this API to send requests for loan disbursement to the beneficiary. The service charges are pooled for the respective party and disbursed at the end of day. Disbursement amount = (Amount - total service charges).

beneId.description: It is the unique ID to identify the beneficiary. Only alphanumeric characters are allowed.

loanId.description: It is the unique ID to identify the loan. Only alphanumeric characters are allowed.

amount.description: It is the loan amount. It should be equal to or greater than 1.00.

transferMode.description: It is the mode of transfer. Allowed values are: banktransfer, neft, imps, rtgs, upi, paytm, and amazonpay. The default transferMode is banktransfer.

serviceCharges.description: It is the service charges that need to be disbursed to different parties.

beneDetails.description: It is the details of the beneficiary.

bankAccount.description: It is the bank account of the beneficiary. It must be between 9-18 alphanumeric characters. It is a required parameter in the case of banktransfer, imps, and neft.

ifsc.description: The IFSC information of the bank account of the dealer/distributor who raised the invoice for the customer to pay. It should be an alphanumeric value of 11 characters. The first 4 characters should be alphabets, the 5th character should be a 0, and the remaining 6 characters should be numerals.

name.description: It is the name of the beneficiary. It should be a maximum of 100 characters. Only alphabets and whitespaces (  ) are allowed.

phone.description: It is the phone number of the beneficiary. The phone number must be registered in India. Only numeric values are allowed. It should be between 8 and 12 characters excluding +91.

email.description: It is the email address of the beneficiary. A maximum of 200 characters are allowed. The value should contain @ and period (.).

vpa.description: It is the virtual payment address of the beneficiary. A maximum of 100 characters are allowed. Accepted values: alphanumeric, period (.), hyphen (-), at sign (@), underscore (_). Underscore (_) and period (.) are accepted before and after at sign (@). Hyphen (-) is accepted only before at sign (@).

address1.description: It is the address of the beneficiary. A maximum of 150 characters are allowed. Only alphanumeric values and whitespaces ( ) are allowed.

message.example: Transfer completed successfully

oneOf.title: Success transfer for beneDetails bank account

message.example: Transfer completed successfully
Transfer completed successfully
Transfer request pending at the bank
APIs not enabled. Please fill out the [Support Form](https://merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/landing?env=prod&raise_issue=1)

post.description: Use this API to request an internal transfer. It is useful for accounts with multiple fund sources. You need to provide either the rechargeAccount or paymentInstrumentId and toPaymentInstrumentId along with the amount.

rechargeAccount.description: It is the Cashfree Payments' internal recharge account number. Alphanumeric characters are allowed.

paymentInstrumentId.description: It is the unique ID to identify the fund source from which you want to transfer the money. Alphanumeric characters are allowed.

toPaymentInstrumentId.description: It is the unique ID to identify the fund source where you want to deposit the money. Alphanumeric characters are allowed.

transferId.description: It is the unique ID to identify the transfer. Alphanumeric, hyphen (-), and underscore (_) characters are allowed. Maximum character limit is 40. The ID is auto-generated if the parameter is left blank.

code-samples.code:
curl --location 'http://{{Host%20Url}}/payout/v1.2/internalTransfer \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer ab9JCVXpkI6ICc5RnIsICN4MzUIJiOicGbhJye..abvSnMtDnpmMehabn5R5VG3eEvNmbcBXDgT-u4LF27TqFnpNSOW0b0Y674hHJJN1sc' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{
    "toPaymentInstrumentId": "COLENDING_WALLET_336561_8888981",
    "paymentInstrumentId": "COLENDING_WALLET_336561_8888982",
    "amount": 1.26,
    "remarks" : "some remarks",
    "transferId" : "testingw123"
}'

code-samples.name: Node

code-samples.code:
from cashfree_sdk.payouts.transfers import Transfers
transfer = Transfers.internal_transfer(amount=1.1, rechargeAccuont="492372992")
